item.title: 欧盟高官警告：意大利拒绝ESM增加了风险因素
item.description: 意大利高层官员警告说，由于意大利未能批准欧洲稳定机制救助基金，一旦未来发生银行业危机，该集团将失去更多保护。【原文：Italy’s failure to ratify the European Stability Mechanism bailout fund leaves the bloc with less protection in case of a future banking crisis, top officials warned.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行股价创 14 年新高，市值超越意大利联合信贷银行
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的股价周一升至 14 年来的新高，市值超过竞争对手意大利联合圣保罗银行（Intesa Sanpaolo SpA），成为意大利最大的银行。【原文：UniCredit SpA’s share price rose to a 14-year high on Monday, lifting its market capitalization past rival Intesa Sanpaolo SpA to make it Italy’s largest bank by that metric.】

item.title: 世界银行认为，如果取消进口禁令，尼日利亚的收入将激增
item.description: 世界银行表示，取消尼日利亚的高关税和进口禁令可大幅增加这个非洲人口最多国家的税收。【原文：Lifting Nigeria’s high tariffs and import bans could significantly increase tax revenue for Africa’s most populous country, the World Bank said.】

item.title: 英国央行泰勒敦促大幅降息后警告 "危险的 "贸易威胁
item.description: 英国央行决策者艾伦-泰勒（Alan Taylor）表示，利率距离摆脱限制性水平还有 "很长的路要走"，并警告唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战会带来 "危险 "威胁。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Alan Taylor said interest rates are still a “long way” from moving out of restrictive levels, warning of the “perilous” threat from Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 嘉年华利用新发行的 10 亿美元债券为更多债务再融资
item.description: 嘉年华公司（Carnival Corp. ）今年第三次发行债券，因为该邮轮运营商正在削减在科威德-19 大流行病期间膨胀的债务负担。【原文：Carnival Corp. is issuing bonds for the third time this year, as the cruise operator chips away at a debt load that had ballooned during the Covid-19 pandemic.】

item.title: ESM总裁称市场对美元的疑虑是欧盟的机会
item.description: 一位欧盟高层决策者表示，该地区应利用投资者对美元和美国国债的疑虑。【原文：A top European Union policymaker said the region should take advantage of investor doubts in the dollar and US Treasuries.】

item.title: 债券销售繁忙周考验涉足市场的投资者
item.description: 定于本周进行的一波市政债券销售将检验投资者在 4 月份市场崩溃期间抛售所持债券后最近出现的买方需求反弹。【原文：A wave of municipal-bond sales scheduled for this week will test a recent rebound in buyer demand after investors sold their holdings during April’s market rout.】

item.title: 比特币价格上涨时的策略性买入模式
item.description: 战略公司几乎每周都会宣布购买比特币，其时间和规模让一些市场观察家怀疑，这位最引人注目的加密货币买家是否在推动数字资产价格上涨。【原文：The timing and scale of Strategy’s almost weekly Bitcoin purchase announcements has some market observers wondering whether the most visible buyer of the cryptocurrency is driving the price of the digital asset higher.】

item.title: 丰业银行称，S&P/TSX 重组将带来 2022 年以来最大的交易额
item.description: 丰业银行（Scotiabank）分析师表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战正在对加拿大的基准股票指数进行清算，该指数下个月的成员变动将有所上升。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s trade war is causing a reckoning on Canada’s benchmark stocks index, which is set to see an uptick in membership changes next month, Scotiabank analysts say.】

item.title: ABB 考虑出售机器人部门以替代分拆上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，ABB 有限公司正在探索出售机器人部门的可能性，作为主要分拆计划的替代方案，该部门的价值可能超过 35 亿美元。【原文：ABB Ltd. is exploring a potential sale of the robotics unit, which could be worth more than $3.5 billion, as an alternative to the main spinoff plan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纳格尔和埃斯克里瓦表示，欧洲央行必须谨慎对待下一步利率措施
item.description: 两位理事会成员表示，鉴于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普经济政策的高度不确定性，欧洲央行在决定下一步利率举措时必须谨慎行事。【原文：The European Central Bank must be careful in deciding on its next interest-rate moves given high uncertainty about President Donald Trump’s economic policies, according to two Governing Council members.】

item.title: 几内亚将于 12 月举行总统和立法选举
item.description: 几内亚总理阿马杜-奥里-巴（Amadou Oury Bah）表示，几内亚将于 12 月举行总统和立法选举，以便在三年多的军事独裁统治后恢复宪法秩序。【原文：Guinea will hold presidential and legislative elections in December to return the country to constitutional order after more than three years of military dictatorship, Prime Minister Amadou Oury Bah said.】

item.title: 人工智能搜索初创公司 Perplexity 即将获得价值 140 亿美元的融资
item.description: Perplexity AI 公司是一家建立人工智能搜索引擎以与谷歌竞争的初创公司，该公司正在就以 140 亿美元的估值进行新一轮融资进行深入讨论。【原文：Perplexity AI Inc., a startup building an artificial intelligence search engine to compete with Google, is in advanced discussions to raise a new round of funding at a $14 billion valuation — a jump from its most recent value but lower than it was initially targeting.】

item.title: H&F 旗下 Hub 公司完成 16 亿美元融资，估值达 290 亿美元
item.description: 由 Hellman & Friedman 支持的 Hub International Ltd. 在新一轮融资中筹集了 16 亿美元的新股本，该保险经纪公司的估值为 290 亿美元。【原文：Hellman & Friedman-backed Hub International Ltd. has raised $1.6 billion in fresh equity in a funding round that values the insurance brokerage at $29 billion.】

item.title: 为俄罗斯从事间谍活动的保加利亚人被英国法官判处监禁
item.description: 六名保加利亚人是 Wirecard 在逃前首席运营官所经营的俄罗斯间谍团伙的成员，他们被伦敦一名法官判处长达 10 年的监禁。【原文：Six Bulgarian nationals who were part of a Russian spy ring run by Wirecard’s fugitive ex-chief operating officer were sentenced to as long as 10 years in prison by a London judge.】

item.title: 普利兹克赢得量子胜利，澳大利亚公司选择芝加哥为枢纽
item.description: 由伊利诺伊州州长 JB-普利兹克（JB Pritzker）倡导的伊利诺伊州量子园区在芝加哥南区的未来租户名单上又增加了一家澳大利亚科技公司，从而推动了他将伊利诺伊州打造为量子产业中心的努力。【原文：Illinois’s quantum campus, championed by Governor JB Pritzker, is adding an Australian tech firm to its list of future tenants on Chicago’s South Side, advancing his push to make the state a hub for the industry.】

item.title: Confidencial 报》称，西班牙电信聘请花旗出售智利业务
item.description: Telefonica SA 委托花旗集团管理其智利子公司的出售事宜，在此之前，这家总部位于西班牙的公司已经出售了其在拉丁美洲的许多其他子公司。【原文：Telefonica SA mandated Citigroup Inc. to manage the sale of its Chilean unit, after the Spanish-based company offloaded many of its other subsidiaries in Latin America.】

item.title: 巴西乙醇生产商 Raizen 同意出售糖厂以减轻债务负担
item.description: 由 Cosan SA 和壳牌（Shell Plc）共同拥有的巴西乙醇生产商和燃料分销商 Raizen SA 已同意出售其一家甘蔗加工厂，作为削减债务努力的一部分。【原文：Raizen SA, the Brazilian ethanol producer and fuel distributor co-owned by Cosan SA and Shell Plc, has agreed to sell one of its sugar-cane processing plants as part of efforts to slash debt.】

item.title: 梅奥认为摩根大通将在三年内成为价值 1 万亿美元的银行
item.description: 据富国银行（Wells Fargo）称，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. could become the first bank to reach a $1 trillion market capitalization within the next three years, according to Wells Fargo.】

item.title: 随着北京影响力的增长，彼得罗石油公司将签署中国投资协议
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）表示，他计划签署中国的 "一带一路 "倡议，这可能会促进北京日益增长的影响力，同时进一步恶化他与美国的关系。【原文：Colombian President Gustavo Petro said he plans to sign up to China’s Belt and Road initiative, potentially boosting Beijing’s growing influence while further souring his relationship with the US.】

item.title: 众议院税收法案草案要求设立 3 万美元的 SALT 扣除限额
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，众议院税务委员会关于延长唐纳德-特朗普总统减税政策的法案草案要求将州和地方税减免额提高到 3 万美元，但仅限于收入在 40 万美元或以下的人群。【原文：The House tax committee’s draft bill to renew President Donald Trump’s tax cuts calls for increasing the state and local tax deduction to $30,000, but limits the write-off to those earning $400,000 or less, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 塞内加尔寻求为数字经济吸引 17 亿美元投资
item.description: 塞内加尔总统巴西鲁-迪奥马耶-法耶（Bassirou Diomaye Faye）寻求吸引 17 亿美元的投资，用于建设数字基础设施，并为该国青年创造更多就业机会。【原文：Senegalese President Bassirou Diomaye Faye seeks to attract $1.7 billion of investments to build digital infrastructure and create more job opportunities for the country’s youth.】

item.title: 贸易战降温，交易员认为美联储 2025 年仅降息两次
item.description: 在美国和中国同意削减关税并缓和贸易战之后，交易员们降低了对美联储今年降息的押注，仅将 2025 年的降息幅度定为两次。【原文：Traders lowered their bets on the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cuts this year, pricing in just two reductions for 2025 after the US and China agreed to cut tariffs and moderate their trade war.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯在特朗普访问前成立新的人工智能公司
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普访问沙特阿拉伯之前，沙特阿拉伯成立了一家新公司，投资于整个人工智能价值链。【原文：Saudi Arabia has launched a new firm to invest across the artificial intelligence value chain, ahead of a visit by US President Donald Trump, where the technology is expected to feature prominently on the agenda.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒认为尽管近期有消息称关税影响巨大
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）表示，特朗普政府的关税政策很可能会刺激通胀并拖累经济增长，即使最近宣布降低对中国的征税也是如此。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said the Trump administration’s tariff policies are likely to boost inflation and weigh on economic growth, even with the recently announced reduction in levies on China.】

item.title: 美国欢迎欧盟提出的经济安全合作建议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国对欧盟提出的在共同投资和经济安全挑战方面开展合作的建议表示欢迎，但对双方贸易谈判可能产生的结果仍未作出明确说明。【原文：The US has welcomed European Union proposals to cooperate on mutual investments and economic security challenges, while continuing to provide little clarity on the possible outcomes of trade negotiations between the two sides, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 穆迪称小型私人信贷减弱最快
item.description: 穆迪评级公司的数据显示，2023 年至 2024 年间，小公司贷款的减少速度快于大公司，但整体信贷质量仍强于大流行之前。【原文：Loans taken out by smaller companies weakened at a faster rate between 2023 and 2024 than those by bigger companies, yet overall credit quality remains stronger than before the pandemic, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 塔塔钢铁公司利润超预期增长一倍多
item.description: 塔塔钢铁公司（Tata Steel Ltd. ）第四季度利润增长 112%，主要得益于产品销量增加和成本降低。【原文：Tata Steel Ltd. reported a 112% increase in fourth-quarter profit, helped by higher product sales and lower costs.】

item.title: 中美关税休战刺激股市上涨，波动率指标下挫
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普 4 月份发动贸易攻势后，中美达成关税休战协议，随之而来的波动也随之转向另一个方向。【原文：The volatility that followed in the wake of President Donald Trump’s April trade offensive has swung in the other direction after a US-China tariff truce.】
